attributes.review: Listen I’m all for this fascist for president! As an LGBT woman I know this mans for me! But I simply do not vibe with the graphic design on this one! The colors clashed and the fonts were AGGRESSIVE! The dark red, the navy blue and the bland white? Real original! You’re gonna have to get a better graphic design team if you want my vote 😫😫All apps matter! Just not this one
attributes.title: Ugly app!

attributes.review: I came here to support our Cheeto president but this app didn’t work at all, it sent me a notification saying my grandma was a dirtbag and if you don’t vote for trump than you will regret it. I was so threatened I just had to share this message with others. Don’t download this app
attributes.title: Black lives matter

attributes.review:
This app is disgusting my phone was GLITCHING🤢 the whole time it was downloading I saw a review that said it played music and it does I HATED it.

I downloaded the app to see what’s going on I’m the world but I told it no notifications and they keep on SPAMING my phone with notifications I’m SICK of it this is officially the WORST app in history!
attributes.title: Do not download this

attributes.review: I was so so so excited to bow down to the incredible figure Mr. Donald Trump and keep america great again but when I downloaded this app suddenly my phone started glitching? Like my phone started heating up and I literally had to put it in the fridge! I was so disappointed. Why would trump do this to me? SAD.
attributes.title: Truly the worst app

attributes.review:
Absolutely trash! Worst app I have ever downloaded too many ads, and when you close down the app it doesn’t close all the way and it still runs in the background. The colors of the app are upsetting as well and make me wanna vomit 
Never gonna download again
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: 1. this app took a whole WEEK to download on my phone!! 2. when the app FINALLY downloaded, when i opened the app, it just stayed as a blank screen for an HOUR 3. this app TRACKED MY DEVICE and had the camera on the whole time i had the app downloaded!! 4. i also noticed that the app had my mic ON SO THEY CAN HEAR EVERYTHING I SAY 5. BLACK LIVES MATTER 💗
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!

attributes.review:
😤 This app took over 24 HOURS to download and when it finally decided to download It was super glitchy and I do in fact have good WiFi. The app does not work would not recommend to any one not even to the folks I call my enemies.

Thank you 🙏🏼
attributes.title: Black lives matter✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.review: this app made my dog cry😔 and made my frog set the kitchen on fire😅. worst app ever, made my whole room smell stinky😡 hope others had a better experience😖 because i didn’t😒😔😡💅 this app also came and made my pet worm die😢 it got ran over 69 times because of this app👿 rip mr wiggles. i hope this app gets fixed😪
attributes.title: ThE woRsT🤬

attributes.review: well i saw somewhere that he was trying to delete tik tok. maybe because he was played at his campaign thingy, he is mad because teenagers (tik tok, twitter, k-pop stans, even 12 y/o) played him at his own campaign. anyways back to the point, i found he was trying to delete tik tok but no❤️ i’m deleting this app #Anonymous #wesimpin *excuse the typos*
attributes.title: 🧚🏾‍♂️✨🌈

attributes.review: This app has to be made by the liberals😢 It started charging me $10 every week and messed up my whole phone. Now I can’t donate that money to my favorite racist president🥺 So disappointing if you truly are a trump fan don’t download it and rate it 1 star to take this communist app off the app store!!!
attributes.title: Absolutely AWFUL
